body: Nanao Yukiji 2nd story is too short and it seems not fair for Haru/Hiro, he is only fuck his aunt once and his cousin fuck his mom multiple times
@hothotoverload that's what I friggen said... I felt like that was an extreme tease thing for trying to get people to buy it in the first place, along with the fact it probably was on the deadline.
thats really part 2 of the mom / aunt one ?... so damn short. part 1 was way longer
@vilao21: and that's what makes it "juicy", meaning, we'll have an outcry pouring of angry comments from some of those that get ticked-off. Anyway, another Gucho volume to enjoy. C'est la vie.
Nanao Yukiji's is too short sad
@Shikooo Juicy? That's pure trash and the girl is retarded. The girl gave her virginity to that dude because she wanted to see her Senpai's reaction... and that is it.
